entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -18.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -21.5°C
Wind: 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
